title: Compose Task Description
description: Compose a task description based on activities that are supported by fleets. When supported by fleets, this can be used as a task description for task_request.

category.description: Specify the category for this composed task, as the operators should see it.

detail.description: Specify the detail for this composed task, as the operators should see it.

phases.description: List the phases of the task in the order that they should be performed.

on_cancel.description: A list of activities to perform if the task is canceled during this phase. Each activity is given its own phase which can be skipped but not canceled.

activity.description: Describe the activity of the phase. This must match an activity description supported by one of the fleets. If there should be multiple activities within a phase, then use a Sequence activity.

category.description: The category of this phase's activity.

description.description: A description of the activity. This must match a schema supported by a fleet for the category of this activity.
